GSD36nars2_pu:278: kṛtaṃ vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā // Nar_1.09 //
GSD36nars2_pu:280: kuṭumbahetor utkṣiptaṃ voḍhavyaṃ tat kuṭumbinā // Nar_1.10 //
GSD36nars2_pu:281: nārvāg viṃśatimād varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:282: ṛṇaṃ dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātary athāpi vā // Nar_1.11 //
GSD36nars2_pu:283: dāpyaḥ pararṇam eko 'pi jīvatsv adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam /
GSD36nars2_pu:284: preteṣu tu na tatputraḥ pararṇaṃ dātum arhati // Nar_1.12 //
GSD36nars2_pu:285: na strī patikṛtaṃ dadyād ṛṇaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:286: abhyupetād ṛte yadvā saha patyā kṛtaṃ bhavet // Nar_1.13 //
GSD36nars2_pu:287: dadyād aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā /
GSD36nars2_pu:288: yo vā tadriktham ādadyād yato riktham ṛṇaṃ tataḥ // Nar_1.14 //
GSD36nars2_pu:289: na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ kathaṃcit patyur ābhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:290: āpatkṛtād ṛte puṃsāṃ kuṭumbārtho hi vistaraḥ // Nar_1.15 //
GSD36nars2_pu:292: teṣāṃ tatpratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṃ ca tadāśrayam // Nar_1.16 //
GSD36nars2_pu:293: putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putraṃ strī yānyam āśrayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:294: ṛkthaṃ tasyā haret sarvaṃ niḥsvāyāḥ putra eva tu // Nar_1.17 //
GSD36nars2_pu:295: yā tu sapradhanaiva strī sāpatyā cānyam āśrayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:296: so 'syā dadyād ṛṇaṃ bhartur utsṛjed vā tathaiva tām // Nar_1.18 //
GSD36nars2_pu:297: adhanasya hy aputrasya mṛtasyopaiti yaḥ striyam /
GSD36nars2_pu:298: ṛṇaṃ voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tad evāsya dhanaṃ smṛtam // Nar_1.19 //
GSD36nars2_pu:301: uttamā svairiṇī yā syād uttamā ca punarbhuvām /
GSD36nars2_pu:302: ṛṇaṃ tayoḥ patikṛtaṃ dadyād yas tām upāśnute // Nar_1.21 //
GSD36nars2_pu:305: etāny api pramāṇāni bhartā yady anumanyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:306: putraḥ patyur abhāve vā rājā vā patiputrayoḥ // Nar_1.23 //
GSD36nars2_pu:307: bhartrā prītena yad dattaṃ striyai tasmin mṛte 'pi tat /
GSD36nars2_pu:308: sā yathākāmam aśnīyād dadyād vā sthāvarād ṛte // Nar_1.24 //
GSD36nars2_pu:310: anyatra svāmisaṃdeśān na dāsaḥ prabhur ātmanaḥ // Nar_1.25 //
GSD36nars2_pu:311: putreṇa ca kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yat syāt pitur anicchataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:312: tad apy akṛtam evāhur dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau // Nar_1.26 //
GSD36nars2_pu:313: aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'pi hi na rṇabhāk /
GSD36nars2_pu:314: svātantryaṃ tu smṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyaṃ guṇavayaḥkṛtam // Nar_1.27 //
GSD36nars2_pu:315: trayaḥ svatantrā loke 'smin rājācāryas tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:316: prati prati ca varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svagṛhe gṛhī // Nar_1.28 //
GSD36nars2_pu:318: asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣya ācārye tu svatantratā // Nar_1.29 //
GSD36nars2_pu:319: asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrā dāsāś ca saparigrahāḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:320: svatantras tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt kramāgatam // Nar_1.30 //
GSD36nars2_pu:321: garbhasthaiḥ sadṛśo jñeya ā varṣād aṣṭamāc chiṣuḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:322: bāla ā ṣoḍaśāj jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaś cāpi śabdyate // Nar_1.31 //
GSD36nars2_pu:324: jīvator asvatantraḥ syāj jarayāpi samanvitaḥ // Nar_1.32 //
GSD36nars2_pu:326: abhāve bījino mātā tadabhāve tu pūrvajaḥ // Nar_1.33 //
GSD36nars2_pu:328: anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ceśvarā matāḥ // Nar_1.34 //
GSD36nars2_pu:329: yad bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantras tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:330: akṛtaṃ tad iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstravido janāḥ // Nar_1.35 //
GSD36nars2_pu:331: svatantro 'pi hi yat kāryaṃ kuryād aprakṛtiṃ gataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:332: tad apy akṛtam evāhur asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ // Nar_1.36 //
GSD36nars2_pu:334: rāgadveṣaparītāś ca jñeyās tv aprakṛtiṃ gatāḥ // Nar_1.37 //
GSD36nars2_pu:335: kule jyeṣṭhas tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛtisthaś ca yo bhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:336: tatkṛtaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nāsvatantrakṛtaṃ kṛtam // Nar_1.38 //
GSD36nars2_pu:337: dhanamūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yatnas tatsādhane mataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:338: rakṣaṇaṃ vardhanaṃ bhoga iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt // Nar_1.39 //
GSD36nars2_pu:339: tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalam eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:340: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // Nar_1.40 //
GSD36nars2_pu:342: dhanaṃ saptavidhaṃ śuklam udayo 'py asya tadvidhaḥ // Nar_1.41 //
GSD36nars2_pu:344: kṛtopakārād āptaṃ ca śabalaṃ samudāhṛtam // Nar_1.42 //
GSD36nars2_pu:346: vyājenopārjitaṃ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // Nar_1.43 //
GSD36nars2_pu:347: tena krayo vikrayaś ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:348: vividhāś ca pravartante kriyāḥ saṃbhoga eva ca // Nar_1.44 //
GSD36nars2_pu:349: yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yat kiṃcit kurute naraḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:350: tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca // Nar_1.45 //
GSD36nars2_pu:352: sādhāraṇaṃ syāt trividhaṃ śeṣaṃ navavidhaṃ smṛtam // Nar_1.46 //
GSD36nars2_pu:353: kramāgataṃ prītidāyaḥ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GSD36nars2_pu:354: aviśeṣeṇa varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // Nar_1.47 //
GSD36nars2_pu:356: pratigraheṇa yallabdhaṃ yājyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā // Nar_1.48 //
GSD36nars2_pu:358: yuddhopalabdhaṃ kāraś ca daṇḍaś ca vyavahārataḥ // Nar_1.49 //
GSD36nars2_pu:361: sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyo dhanāgamaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:362: viparyayād adharmyaḥ syān na ced āpad garīyasī // Nar_1.51 //
GSD36nars2_pu:364: vaiśyavṛttis tataś coktā na jaghanyā kathaṃcana // Nar_1.52 //
GSD36nars2_pu:365: na kathaṃcana kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ karma vārṣalam /
GSD36nars2_pu:366: vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmaṃ patanīye hi te tayoḥ // Nar_1.53 //
GSD36nars2_pu:367: utkṛṣṭaṃ cāpakṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:368: madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarvasādhāraṇe hi te // Nar_1.54 //
GSD36nars2_pu:369: āpadaṃ brāhmaṇas tīrtvā kṣatravṛttyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:370: utsṛjet kṣatravṛttiṃ tāṃ kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ // Nar_1.55 //
GSD36nars2_pu:371: tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau brāhmaṇo ramate rasāt /
GSD36nars2_pu:372: kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaś cyuto mārgāt so 'pāṅkteyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Nar_1.56 //
GSD36nars2_pu:379: brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyaṃ śuṣkaṃ dāru tṛṇāni ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:381: svayaṃ śīrṇaṃ ca vidalaṃ phalānāṃ badareṅgude /
GSD36nars2_pu:382: rajjuḥ kārpāsikaṃ sūtraṃ tac ced avikṛtaṃ bhavet // Nar_1.61 //
GSD36nars2_pu:384: yady avaśyaṃ tu vikreyās tilā dhānyena tatsāmāḥ // Nar_1.62 //
GSD36nars2_pu:386: mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā // Nar_1.63 //
GSD36nars2_pu:388: sīdanti hi pramāṇāni pramāṇair avyavasthitaiḥ // Nar_1.64 //
GSD36nars2_pu:389: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtaṃ /
GSD36nars2_pu:390: dhanasvīkaraṇe yena dhanī dhanam upāśnute // Nar_1.65 //
GSD36nars2_pu:391: likhitaṃ balavan nityaṃ jīvantas tv eva sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:392: kālātiharaṇād bhuktir iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ // Nar_1.66 //
GSD36nars2_pu:394: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ guru jñeyaṃ bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī // Nar_1.67 //
GSD36nars2_pu:395: vidyamāne 'pi likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu /
GSD36nars2_pu:396: viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram // Nar_1.68 //
GSD36nars2_pu:397: bhujyamānān parair arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyād upekṣate /
GSD36nars2_pu:398: samakṣaṃ jīvato 'py asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe // Nar_1.69 //
GSD36nars2_pu:399: yatkiṃcid daśa varṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī /
GSD36nars2_pu:400: bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati // Nar_1.70 //
GSD36nars2_pu:401: upekṣāṃ kurvatas tasya tūṣṇīṃ bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:402: kāle 'tipanne pūrvokte vyavahāro na sidhyati // Nar_1.71 //
GSD36nars2_pu:403: ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:404: bhuktaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati // Nar_1.72 //
GSD36nars2_pu:406: rājasvaṃ śrotriyasvaṃ ca nopabhogena jīryate // Nar_1.73 //
GSD36nars2_pu:408: ādhyādīny api jīryante strīnarendradhanād ṛte // Nar_1.74 //
GSD36nars2_pu:409: strīdhanaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ na kadācana jīryate /
GSD36nars2_pu:410: anāgamaṃ bhujyamānaṃ vatsarāṇāṃ śatair api // Nar_1.75 //
GSD36nars2_pu:411: nirbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit /
GSD36nars2_pu:412: āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na bhogas tatra kāraṇam // Nar_1.76 //
GSD36nars2_pu:413: anāgamaṃ bhujyate yan na tad bhogo 'tivartate /
GSD36nars2_pu:414: prete tu bhoktari dhanaṃ yāti tadvaṃśyabhogyatām // Nar_1.77 //
GSD36nars2_pu:416: bhuktir eva viśuddhiḥ syāt prāptānāṃ pitṛtaḥ kramāt // Nar_1.78 //
GSD36nars2_pu:418: apratyakṣaṃ ca yad bhuktaṃ ṣaḍ etāny āgamaṃ vinā // Nar_1.79 //
GSD36nars2_pu:420: putreṇa so 'rthaḥ saṃśodhyo na taṃ bhogo 'tivartate // Nar_1.80 //
GSD36nars2_pu:421: yad vināgamam apy ūrdhvaṃ bhuktaṃ pūrvais tribhir bhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:422: na tac chakyam apākartuṃ kramāt tripuruṣāgatam // Nar_1.81 //
GSD36nars2_pu:423: santo 'pi na pramāṇaṃ syur mṛte dhanini sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:424: anyatra śrāvitaṃ yat syāt svayam āsannamṛtyunā // Nar_1.82 //
GSD36nars2_pu:425: na hi pratyarthini prete pramāṇaṃ sākṣiṇāṃ vacaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:426: sākṣimat karaṇaṃ tatra pramāṇaṃ syād viniścaye // Nar_1.83 //
GSD36nars2_pu:427: śrāvitas tv ātureṇāpi yas tv artho dharmasaṃhitaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:428: mṛte 'pi tatra sākṣī syāt ṣaṭsu cānvāhitādiṣu // Nar_1.84 //
GSD36nars2_pu:432: tat kusīdam iti proktaṃ tena vṛttiḥ kusīdinām // Nar_1.86 //
GSD36nars2_pu:433: kāyikā kālikā caiva kāritā ca tathā smṛtā /
GSD36nars2_pu:434: cakravṛddhiś ca śāstreṣu tasya vṛddhiś caturvidhā // Nar_1.87 //
GSD36nars2_pu:436: pratimāsaṃ sravati yā vṛddhiḥ sā kālikā smṛtā // Nar_1.88 //
GSD36nars2_pu:437: vṛddhiḥ sā kāritā nāma ya rṇikena svayaṃkṛtā /
GSD36nars2_pu:438: vṛddher api punar vṛddhiś cakravṛddhir udāhṛtā // Nar_1.89 //
GSD36nars2_pu:440: deśācāravidhis tv anyo yatra rṇam avatiṣṭhati // Nar_1.90 //
GSD36nars2_pu:444: ghṛtasyāṣṭaguṇā vṛddhiḥ strīpaśūnāṃ ca saṃtatiḥ // Nar_1.92 //
GSD36nars2_pu:446: āyudhānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ carmaṇas tāmralohayoḥ // Nar_1.93 //
GSD36nars2_pu:447: anyeṣāṃ caiva sarveṣām iṣṭakānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:448: akṣayyā vṛddhir eteṣāṃ manur āha prajāpatiḥ // Nar_1.94 //
GSD36nars2_pu:450: vṛddhir aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca // Nar_1.95 //
GSD36nars2_pu:451: na vṛddhiḥ prītidattānāṃ syād anākāritā kvacit /
GSD36nars2_pu:452: anākāritam apy ūrdhvaṃ vatsarārdhād vivardhate // Nar_1.96 //
GSD36nars2_pu:454: vṛddhis tu yoktā dhānyānāṃ vārdhuṣyaṃ tad udāhṛtam // Nar_1.97 //
GSD36nars2_pu:456: āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu brāhmaṇasya na vārdhuṣam // Nar_1.98 //
GSD36nars2_pu:457: brāhmaṇasya tu yad deyaṃ sānvayasya na cāsti saḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:459: yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syur na ca saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:460: tadā dadyāt svajātibhyas teṣv asatsv apsu nikṣipet // Nar_1.100 //
GSD36nars2_pu:462: adadad yācyamānas tu śeṣahānim avāpnuyāt // Nar_1.101 //
GSD36nars2_pu:463: lekhyaṃ dadyād ṛṇe śuddhe tadabhāve pratiśravam /
GSD36nars2_pu:464: dhanikarṇikayor evaṃ viśuddhiḥ syāt parasparam // Nar_1.102 //
GSD36nars2_pu:465: viśrambhahetū dvāv atra pratibhūr ādhir eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:466: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś ca dve pramāṇe vyaktikārake // Nar_1.103 //
GSD36nars2_pu:468: trividhaḥ pratibhūr dṛṣṭas triṣv evārtheṣu sūribhiḥ // Nar_1.104 //
GSD36nars2_pu:470: pratibhūs tad ṛṇaṃ dadyād anupasthāpayaṃs tathā // Nar_1.105 //
GSD36nars2_pu:471: bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'rthaṃ yathākṛtam /
GSD36nars2_pu:472: arthe 'viśeṣite hy eṣu dhaninaś chandataḥ kriyā // Nar_1.106 //
GSD36nars2_pu:474: ṛṇikas taṃ pratibhuve dviguṇaṃ pratipādayet // Nar_1.107 //
GSD36nars2_pu:475: adhikriyata ity ādhiḥ sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:477: sa punar dvividhaḥ prokto gopyo bhogyas tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:479: pramādād dhaninas tadvad ādhau vikṛtim āgate /
GSD36nars2_pu:480: vinaṣṭe mūlanāśaḥ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte // Nar_1.110 //
GSD36nars2_pu:482: ādhir anyo 'dhikartavyo deyaṃ vā dhanine dhanam // Nar_1.111 //
GSD36nars2_pu:484: śakyaprekṣam ṛṇaṃ dāpyaḥ kāle kāle yathodayam // Nar_1.112 //
GSD36nars2_pu:485: śakto vā yadi daurātmyān na dadyād dhanine dhanam /
GSD36nars2_pu:486: rājñā dāpayitavyaḥ syād gṛhītvāṃśaṃ tu viṃśakam // Nar_1.113 //
GSD36nars2_pu:489: lekhyaṃ tu dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ svahastānyakṛtaṃ tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:490: asākṣimat sākṣimac ca siddhir deśasthites tayoḥ // Nar_1.115 //
GSD36nars2_pu:492: tat pramāṇaṃ smṛtaṃ lekhyam aviluptakramākṣaram // Nar_1.116 //
GSD36nars2_pu:496: tad apy apārthaṃ likhitam ṛte tv ādheḥ sthirāśrayāt // Nar_1.118 //
GSD36nars2_pu:497: ādhir yo dvividhaḥ prokto jaṅgamaḥ sthāvaras tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:498: siddhir atrobhayasyāsya bhogo yady asti nānyathā // Nar_1.119 //
GSD36nars2_pu:499: darśitaṃ pratikālaṃ yac chrāvitaṃ śrāvitaṃ ca yat /
GSD36nars2_pu:500: lekhyaṃ sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣv api hi sākṣiṣu // Nar_1.120 //
GSD36nars2_pu:502: na lekhyaṃ siddhim āpnoti jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu // Nar_1.121 //
GSD36nars2_pu:505: yasmin syāt saṃśayo lekhye bhūtābhūtakṛte kvacit /
GSD36nars2_pu:512: sākṣibhyo likhitaṃ śreyo likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ // Nar_1.125 //
GSD36nars2_pu:514: kartavyam anyal lekhyaṃ syād eṣa lekhyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_1.126 //
GSD36nars2_pu:518: śrotrasya yat paro brūte cakṣuṣaḥ kāyakarma yat // Nar_1.128 //
GSD36nars2_pu:519: ekādaśavidhaḥ sākṣī sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:520: kṛtaḥ pañcavidhas teṣāṃ ṣaḍvidho 'kṛta ucyate // Nar_1.129 //
GSD36nars2_pu:521: likhitaḥ smāritaś caiva yadṛcchābhijña eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:522: gūḍhaś cottarasākṣī ca sākṣī pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_1.130 //
GSD36nars2_pu:524: grāmaś ca prāḍvivākaś ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām // Nar_1.131 //
GSD36nars2_pu:525: kāryeṣv abhyantaro yaḥ syād arthinā prahitaś ca yaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:526: kulaṃ kulavivādeṣu bhaveyus te 'pi sākṣiṇaḥ // Nar_1.132 //

GSD36nars2_pu:1781: kārṣāpaṇo 'ṇḍikā jñeyāś catasras tās tu dhānakaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1782: taddvādaśa suvarṇasya dīnāraś citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_19.68 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1783: vārttāṃ trayīṃ cāpy atha daṇḍanītim rājānuvartet saṃtatāpramattaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1784: hanyād upāyair nipuṇair gṛhītān pure ca rāṣṭre nigṛhṇīyāt pāpān //
GSD36nars2_pu:1785: yadā sākṣī na vidyate vivāde vadatāṃ nṛṇām /
GSD36nars2_pu:1786: tadā divyaiḥ parīkṣeta śapathaiś ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ // Nar_20.1 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1788: devatāpitṛpādāś ca dattāni sukṛtāni ca // Nar_20.2 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1790: alpeṣu ca naraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śapathaiḥ śāpayen naram // Nar_20.3 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1791: ete hi śapathāḥ proktāḥ sukarās svalpasaṃśaye /
GSD36nars2_pu:1792: sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca vidhir divyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Nar_20.4 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1794: divyaḥ pañcavidho jñeya ity āha bhagavān manuḥ // Nar_20.5 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1795: dhaṭo 'gnir udakaṃ caiva viṣaṃ kośaś ca pañcamaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1796: uktāny etāni divyāni dūṣitānāṃ viśodhane // Nar_20.6 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1802: ṣaḍḍhastaṃ tu tayor dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ parimāṇataḥ // Nar_20.8 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1803: pādayor antaraṃ hastaṃ bhaved adhyardham eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:1804: śikyadvayaṃ samāsajya dhaṭe karkaṭake dṛḍhe // Nar_20.9 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1805: tulayitvā naraṃ pūrvaṃ cihnaṃ kuryād dhaṭasya tu /
GSD36nars2_pu:1806: kakṣāsthānena taṃ tulyam avatārya tato dhaṭāt // Nar_20.10 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1808: tasminn evaṃ kṛte sā cet kakṣe sthāpya suniścalā // Nar_20.11 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1809: tulito yadi vardheta śuddhaḥ syān nātre saṃśayaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1810: samo vā hīyamāno vā na viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Nar_20.12 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1812: tvaṃ vetsi sarvabhūtānāṃ pāpāni sukṛtāni ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:1813: tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Nar_20.13 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1815: tad eva saṃśayāpannaṃ dharmatas trātum arhasi // Nar_20.14 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1816: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi lohasya vidhim uttamam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1820: kalpitair maṇḍalair evam uṣitasya śucer api /
GSD36nars2_pu:1823: hastābhyāṃ piṇḍam ādāya śanaiḥ saptapadaṃ vrajet // Nar_20.18 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1824: na maṇḍalam atikrāmen nāpy arvāk pādayet padam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1825: na ca pātayetāprāptaḥ yāvadbhūmir prakalpitā // Nar_20.19 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1827: adagdhaḥ sarvato yas tu sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Nar_20.20 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1828: bhayād vā pātayate yas tv adagdho yo vibhāvyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:1829: punas taṃ hārayel lohaṃ sthitir eṣā purātanī /
GSD36nars2_pu:1830: anena vidhinā kāryo hutāśasamayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_20.21 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1832: sukṛtaṃ duḥkṛtaṃ loken(a) ajñātaṃ vidyate tvayā // Nar_20.22 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1834: yathāvad eva jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Nar_20.23 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1836: tad enaṃ saṃśayāpannaṃ dharmatas trātum arhasi // Nar_20.24 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1837: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi toyasya vidhim uttamam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1839: madhyamas tu śaro grāhyaḥ puruṣeṇa yavīyasā /
GSD36nars2_pu:1840: pratyānītasya tasyātha sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Nar_20.26 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1841: anyathā na viśuddhaḥ syād ekāṅgam api darśayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1842: sthānād anyatra vā gacched yasmin pūrvaṃ niveṣitaḥ // Nar_20.27 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1843: striyas tu na balāt kāryā na pumān api durbalaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1844: bhīrutvād yoṣito mṛtyuḥ kṛśasyāpi balāt kuryāt /
GSD36nars2_pu:1845: sahasā prāpnuyāt sarvāṃs tasmād etān na majjayet // Nar_20.28 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1848: yataś cāgnir abhūd asmāt tatas toyaṃ viśiṣyate // Nar_20.30 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1850: tasmāt satyena bhagavañ jaleśa trātum arhasi // Nar_20.31 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1851: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi viṣasya vidhim uttamam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1852: tulayitvā viṣaṃ pūrvaṃ deyam etad dhimāgame // Nar_20.32 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1853: na pūrvāhṇe na madhyāhne na saṃdhyāyāṃ tu dharmavit /
GSD36nars2_pu:1854: śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu varṣāsu ca na dāpayet // Nar_20.33 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1855: bhagnaṃ ca dāritaṃ caiva dhūpitaṃ miśritaṃ tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:1856: kālakūṭam alaṃbuṃ ca viṣaṃ yatnena varjayet // Nar_20.34 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1860: viṣasya tu yavān sapta dadyāc chodye ghṛtaplutān // Nar_20.36 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1861: viṣasya palaṣaḍbhāgād bhāgo viṃśatimas tu yaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1862: tam aṣṭabhāgahīnaṃ tu śodhye dadyād ghṛtaplutam // Nar_20.37 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1866: viśuddham iti taṃ jñātvā rājā satkṛtya mokṣayet // Nar_20.39 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1867: tvaṃ viṣa brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ satyadharmaratau sthitaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1869: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kośasya vidhim uttamam // Nar_20.41 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1872: yadbhaktaḥ so 'bhiyuktaḥ syāt taddaivatyaṃ tu pāyayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1873: saptāhād yasya dṛśyate dvisaptāhena vā punaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1874: pratyātmikaṃ tu yatkiṃcit saiva tasya vibhāvanā // Nar_20.43 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1875: dvisaptāhāt paraṃ yasya mahad vā vaikṛtaṃ bhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1880: dadyād rājābhiyuktānāṃ pretya ceha ca nandati // Nar_20.46 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1881: na viṣaṃ brāhmaṇe dadyān na lohaṃ kṣatriyo haret /
GSD36nars2_pu:1882: na nimajjyāpsu vaiśyaś ca śūdraḥ kośaṃ na pāyayet // Nar_20.47 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1883: varṣāsu na viṣaṃ dadyāt hemante nāpsu majjayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1884: na lohaṃ hārayed grīṣme na kośaṃ pāyayen niśi // Nar_20.48 //
